Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute at 43rd/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, Pershing, King Drive, 43rd and Cottage Grove due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cottage Grove, Pershing, King Drive, 43rd and Cottage Grove due to, street blockage.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person near the tracks at Oak Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person near the tracks at Oak Park. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
